other_tests.findings: Findings consistent with the diagnosis of sarcoidosis.
Well-formed, noncaseating granulomas. Stains for acid-fast bacilli and methenamine silver stains for fungus were negative.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The initial report was normal but later re-evaluated to show granulomas.
Stains for acid-fast bacilli and fungal and Gramâ€™s stains were negative.
